patthana16.54:4.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.54:4.2: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.54:4.3: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaṭigho ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.54:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.54:5.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana16.54:5.4: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho naappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.54:5.6: Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
